item.title: [508] Shops error
item.dc:creator: @Godsent Godsent
item.description:
@Godsent wrote:

case 278:
if(itemId == p.shop2[itemSlot])
{
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop2p[itemSlot]);
}
else if(itemId == p.shop3[itemSlot])
{
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop3p[0]);	
}
else if(itemId == p.shop4[itemSlot])
{
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop4p[itemSlot]);
}
else if(itemId == p.shop5[itemSlot])
{
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop5p[0]);
}
else if(itemId == p.shop6[itemSlot])
{
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop6p[0]);
}
else if(itemId == p.shop7[itemSlot])
{
	p.frames.sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop7p[0]);
}
	break;

You may need to change frames to Frames.

I don’t know anything about 508’s so i don’t know the methods. But you don’t have a method called getActionSender() in the class Player in the package palidino76.rs2.players

item.title: [508] Shops error
item.dc:creator: @King_Lingerz King Lingerz
item.description:
@King_Lingerz wrote:

Hey, I got this compiler error:

);

);

location: class palidino76.rs2.players.Player

         ^

location: class palidino76.rs2.players.Player
        p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop7p[0])
         ^
6 errors
Press any key to continue . . .

This is what’s in my ItemOption1.java relating to shops:

case 278:
if(itemId == p.shop2[itemSlot])
{
	p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop2p[itemSlot]);
}
else if(itemId == p.shop3[itemSlot])
{
	p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop3p[0]);	
}
else if(itemId == p.shop4[itemSlot])

}
else if(itemId == p.shop7[itemSlot])
{
	p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "This item costs "+p.shop7p[0]);
}
	break;
